entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 70 percent chance of showers over northern sections late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the Coastal mountains in the afternoon. High 9. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear late in the evening. 70 percent chance of showers over northern sections early in the evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the Coastal mountains in the evening. Wind becoming light near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 11 February 2023
